def_cn: （学校或医院）选择不受当地政府管辖的，依靠国家资助的
def_en: An opt-out school or hospital has chosen to leave local government control and manage itself using national government money.

def_cn: （学校或医院）选择不受当地政府管辖
def_en: You can refer to the action taken by a school or hospital in which they choose not to be controlled by a local government authority as an opt-out.

def_cn: （条款）允许退出的，同意不参与的
def_en: An opt-out clause in an agreement gives people the choice not to be involved in one part of that agreement.

def_cn: （针对协议某一部分的）退出，不参与
def_en: You can refer to the action of choosing not to be involved in a particular part of an agreement as an opt-out.
